data.title: Sun King Inc.
data.meta_description: Solar energy is not only safe for the planet it is a cost effective way for households to generate their own electricity. Sun King Inc has a range of solar products to help you on Oahu, Maui and Kauai to save money and live a cleaner, more environmentally friendly lifestyle.
data.text:
Bringing you Solar Energy Options

At Sun King Inc. We are proud to offer a wide range of solar electric systems as energy options for your home or business.

Solar energy is not only safe for the planet it is a cost effective way for households to generate their own electricity. Sun King Inc has a range of solar products to help you on Oahu, Maui and Kauai to save money and live a cleaner, more environmentally friendly lifestyle. We offer:

Solar hot water systems, Solar photo-voltaic systems, Solar Air Conditioners, Solar Pool Heating and much more.

For more information, call or drop by our showrooms in Kahului, Honolulu and Lihue and talk with a member of our friendly staff today. We are happy to answer any questions you may have.

Send Us A Message

What We Offer

Sun King Inc has a great range of energy systems and equipment to help you save money and reduce the emissions that come from your home. We carry many different solar products, including:

Solar electric systems

Solar hot water systems

Solar Battery Systems

Solar Air Conditioners

Solar Pool Heating

Sales & service on Oahu, Maui & Kauai

Our products are made from quality materials that will help you harvest the sun's natural energy for years to come with little maintenance.

Talk to us in Kahului, Honolulu and Lihue about how you can save money and protect the environment.

What We're About

At Sun King Inc, our staff members are passionate about helping you understand how you can save on your energy costs and minimize your personal carbon footprint. We want to help our customers reduce the impact they have on the environment.

Talk to our friendly team about our selection of solar electric systems and products in Kahului. We are always pleased to help you save energy--and save money as well. Let us help you save the planet. Call us today!

Pull the Plug on Electric - Go Solar!

Looking for solar hot water systems for your home or business? Sun King Inc in Kahului, Honolulu and Lihue, has just the solution for you--solar power! Trust us to give you everything you need. We have been serving the community for years and have built up a broad and very satisfied client base. Invest in a better tomorrow and call us today for an estimate on solar panels and alternative electricity options.

The Team

Sun King, Inc. opened for business in 1976 with a firm commitment to provide the highest quality products and installation on our solar and water products. In that time we have succeeded in our mission and grown an extensive client base we have happily served.

We have three locations on Oahu Kauai, and Maui. We look forward to a bright future in the Hawaiian Islands and continuing our tradition in excellence that sets us apart from our competitions.

Our experienced team is deeply committed to alternative electricity. We believe that every customer deserves to have the information and resources they need to make an informed choice about how their electricity is produced.

Sun King Inc is proud to offer families and businesses in Maui, Oahu and Kauai solar hot water & photo voltaic systems to help the environment and bring down household power costs. Every member of our team is qualified to talk with you about energy solutions that will meet your needs.

The Service

Sun King Inc, the Award-Wining Accolades in 2009.

WASHINGTON D.C., June 8, 2009 -- Sun King has been selected for the 2009 Best of Hawaiian Islands Award in the Solar Energy Contractor category by the U.S. Commerce Association (USCA)

The USCA Best of Local Business Award Program recognizes outstanding local businesses throughout the country. Each year, the USCA identifies companies that they believe have achieved exceptional marketing success in their local community and business category. These are local companies that enhance the positive image of small business through service to their customers and community.

Various sources of information were gathered and analyzed to choose the winners in each category. The 2009 USCA Award Program focused on quality, not quantity. Winners are determined based on the information gathered both internally by the USCA and data provided by third parties.
